website_summaries.verdict: If you need to switch between multiple processor-intensive apps, and nothing less than the best visuals and highest speed will do, this elegant MacBook is for you.
pros: 8-core processor runs apps smoothly and quickly
Wide 16” display with a gorgeous 4096x2160 resolution
cons: It is no surprise that Apple’s best MacBook would be a pricy one

customer_reviews.title: Clicks while processing data
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed.....As soon as I added Lightroom and started process photos, the laptop began to "click" during the processing phase! Obviously this isn't normal; currently in the process of returning :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SCREEN MALFUNTION
customer_reviews.text: its hardly been a week i bought the MacBook Pro 16". and i am already facing trouble. whenever i play a video there is a green screen flash coming. i have no clue whats going on. i did not even install any major applications on the laptop too. This is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: shanthan

customer_reviews.text: Battery life is supposed to run up to 11 hours yet mine dies at around 1-2. I've been on it right now for about 20 minutes and the battery has dropped about 15%. My laptop also begins to get really hot after using it for a while and I can hear the fans running at their maximum. I'm not sure what the issue is since the sellers are selling authentic apple products. I will be returning and just purchasing from apple.
customer_reviews.author: Lilia Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Mac dropped dead right after the "return window" closed. Good timing, Apple!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this gorgeous machine that's fits my needs exactly DID drop dead just now, after running well for weeks. I've read that Apple installs a "drop dead" chip in its machines, but I never thought they got the timing as precise as this. Well done, Apple. But now I'm out my 2000 bucks (PLUS) and I have a dead box sitting on my work desk. This is not good, not even for a laugh. I CANNOT contact the seller either. Maybe they all died from the virus, or SOME virus. PLEASE, good folks at Apple and Amazon, help me! Thank y'all.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard J. Baars

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this now times and it’s almost like a decoy model laptop that you would see on display at a retailer this is aweful for 2,000 laptop! I don’t recommend buying it through Amazon I think they got a shipment in of fake laptops
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Crashes with Kernal Panics Every Day
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend buying any of the new T2-based Macbooks that Apple is producing. I received mine about a week ago, and every day, after the laptop falls asleep, it crashes and restarts with a kernel panic. I started googling and realized this is an issue affecting a number of owners -- you can search for "macbook pro 16 kernel panics" on Reddit or MacRumors for more information. While the laptop in general is lovely, and powerful, it's not ready for prime time, which is sad for a machine in the thousands of dollars.
customer_reviews.author: elliott_c

customer_reviews.title: Living my best life!
customer_reviews.text: I can finally sit down at my local coffee shop and look like a cool Mac user now! When people walk in, I can subtly peak over my MacBook Pros screen and semi-acknowledge their existence! I’m finally living my best life.
customer_reviews.author: R. Heimuli

customer_reviews.title: Apple has lost me as a fan
customer_reviews.text: I bought this only to find out that you can not upgrade the hard drive or ram EVER. So as technology improves and you want to get more ram or storage you have to buy a new computer. That is very disappointing coming from apple.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery, legit, great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought on Cyber Monday. This 16 inch Mac is aweeeesomeeeee!!! 0.) Expercom is a legit seller with a great price; I saved more than $216. 1.) Shipping: 2 days only, satisfy an impatient guy like me. 2.) Product: Great overall, but the keyboard is not that "magical". 3.) I didn't experience any issues... yet, no popping/clicking sounds while playing videos/using apps. Highly recommended product!!! P/s: I heard Apple will release a new Macbook in late 2020 with Mini-LED screen. IMHO, if you're having trouble with the clicking sounds or any issues, you should wait until 2020 to buy a Macbook xD.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Tran

customer_reviews.title: Form before function
customer_reviews.text: Slim and sleek but it comes at the cost of loud fan noise and thermal throttling. The screen is nice but has ridiculous ghosting. Will probably return and stick with a mac mini for my macOS needs. If you're looking to use this for office work/web browsing then its probably fine. Throw anything heavy at it and it sounds like a mini jet engine and the area above the touch-bar gets worryingly hot. Apple should consider adding a quarter inch in height and adding exhaust fan ports to the sides to allow people to actually take advantage of 8 cores and a 5500 gfx chip rather than getting throttled a few minutes into a game or heavy app usage.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian B.

customer_reviews.title: Amazon sold me a 4 year old, dented, dinged, and scratched MBP they advertised as a new MBP.
customer_reviews.text: Buyers beware. I purchased what was advertised as the new, 2019 16” MBP in Space Gray. What Amazon delivered was a late 2016 15” dented, dinged, scuffed, and scratched laptop in silver with a screen that’s loosely attached to the rest of the body. The model and serial numbers on the packaging don’t match up with the laptop. These are sold and shipped by Amazon. Update: an Amazon customer service representative mentioned that a previous customer returned their old laptop in the new model laptop’s box, which means Amazon knowingly sold me a used laptop instead of the new one I purchased. How many checks are failing here?
customer_reviews.author: EmKay

customer_reviews.title: Overheating Macbook
customer_reviews.text: Strongly recommend ordering from the website, my macbook overheats with only a few tabs open and fan runs constantly. Even when all applications are closed, the fans are constantly running. I contacted support however they can't seem to assist me in fixing this issue.
customer_reviews.author: seonyi

customer_reviews.title: Defective purchase
customer_reviews.text: Laptop came in sealed box. Upon startup (initial welcome/boot screen) 3/4 of the screen turns black and then crashes and restarts. Never made it to desktop image. Called Apple and was on technical support with them for 40 mins trying everything. They deemed it a hardware failure and recommended a return. I returned to amazon and ordered through Apple directly. Disappointed with this time-sensitive purchase which ended up being defective.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Great MBP
customer_reviews.text: I have a SONY VAIO for 12 years. It has NEVER given me any problems, and for some time now I've been thinking about trading for an MBP. I wasn't sure about switching my VAIO / W7 because of the criticism I've been reading in recent years about what Apple was doing with its computers and complaints about the keyboard, temperature, slow speed and so on. Glad to have waited because this MBP is amazing. I really hope that this model doesn't show any issues as the previous ones.
customer_reviews.author: Tato

customer_reviews.title: Too much stress!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is 5-6 hours! You can’t return it or you need to pay 15% of purchase + shipping! And they will not give you 18 months payment! You need to pay once and full price! Easier way to get MacBook from store only!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Aya

customer_reviews.title: A Return to Form
customer_reviews.text: Finally a macbook with the pleasant writing experience again. I stopped buying macs after my 2012 MBP retina purchase, because of the butterfly keys fiasco(2015-2019). Overall, a really great laptop. Love that they bumped the screen size to 16 inches while keeping almost the same form factor (by thinning the bezels). Note: this maybe the last macbook pro 16 inch with Intel processors, from 2020 on Apple announced they will use their own ARM based processors which doesn't use x86-64 instruction sets. In short, you can't use Parallels desktop nor bootcamp on future macbook models. Grab emm' while they are still Intel based.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love love my Late 2019 1T 16G Ram LAPTOP
customer_reviews.text: THE keyboard is amazing but Macbook Pros are the best they last 10 years so you better get you one. Leave Windows in the dust. we had a Laptop version of Surface A JOKE! They run all those commercials bc they HAVE TOO. THE TOUCH SCREEN IS OVER RATED ON SURFACE... I LOVE APPLE EVERYTHING. LOL ALTHOUGH I HAVE SAMSUNG 10 PHONE... WHY I BOUGHT FROM AMAZON? GOT IT IN 4 DAYS ON PRIME, BUT EVERYWHERE ELSE IT WAS A WEEK OR SO WAIT OR YOU HAD TO PAY EXTRA. THX AMAZON
customer_reviews.author: Ming

customer_reviews.title: A GOOD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: My old Mac Book Pro had serious problems trying to run Catilana. So I threw in the towel and bought this new one. The PC works very well. Catinlina has problems, like loosing files and is somewhat unstable. I have hard drive which Catalina will not format with the new system. If I go bak to my old Mac I can reformat it and then it will work with Catalina. Jobs would never have let this sloppy programing out the door. Best suggestion is back up often. Because you may loose file any time.
customer_reviews.author: Older Critic

customer_reviews.title: Great machine if you don’t use the touch bar.
customer_reviews.text: Almost everything is great about this machine: the thermal is great compared to previous 15” model, the speaker is breathtaking, the screen is gorgeous, the build is solid, the keyboard is reliable, but the touch bar makes me want to throw this great machine to the wall on multiple occasions when I absolutely need to use it. This will be my last Macbook Pro as long as the touch bar exists.
customer_reviews.author: Jianyu Chen

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in the service
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item for my wife after she got a new job and the battery leaked in the package and was scarred by it on my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Holcomb

customer_reviews.title: It's an Apple!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about a new MacBook Pro? Love everything about it including the new keyboard, refined touch bar, fingerprint sensor, separate "Esc" key and of course the 16-inch hi def display. This was a great value considering a similarly configured previous model actually costs more. The processing power is awesome for my music and video production tasks. Love it, love it, love it !!!
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: It's "OK" for a Mac... Not Perfect...
customer_reviews.text: I've been a Mac user for around 25 years, so I know Apple pretty well. This laptop is nice. It runs efficiently, doesn't get too hot, but the battery life is BY FAR not what they claim it to be. Also — my biggest complaint — is that the built-in video camera SUCKS big time. I was sorely disappointed when I switched from my "ancient" 2013 MacBook Pro, which had a pretty decent camera, over to this new one, only to find that the camera resolution was horrendous. I had to buy an external camera for video calls with my clients... it's THAT bad! Everything else seems to be high-quality Apple-ness, as expected.
customer_reviews.author: MissCynthia

customer_reviews.title: Real or Fake?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 16 inch MacBook Pro from Amazon dealer and not a third party international seller. Most things work well and I haven't had any problems after two weeks. EXCEPT the bluetooth isn't working. Other than that the computer works well, but still have doubts about it being and authentic Apple product. Also, when applying for Apple Care+ the serial number was not eligible, which lead me to believe it may not be authentic.
customer_reviews.author: Hart

customer_reviews.title: Battery life percentage fades in front of your eyes
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item on Amazon since it had a good pricing compared to other outlets. Ordered this beefed up i9 model since I thought I would use it for long time so why not spend extra few hundred bucks more than base model. Turns out this i9 processor is very powerful and consumes a lot of energy. Since I do not work on anything that requires that much processing power I've decided to return this in favor of a base model which is cheaper and i7 therefore uses less energy. I could literally notice that battery percentage was ticking down which rarely happens on a new and expensive laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Iskender Suleimanov

customer_reviews.title: This new Mac is not compatible with major aps and virtually unusable!
customer_reviews.text: There was no mention on description that indicated this new model could not use the application software I use. Also the software description like Photoshop Essentials cannot run on this 64 bit computer. The laptop is actually unusable because of the software issues. There is no conversion dates for the major software used. I am very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Ruggiero

customer_reviews.title: Overcharged and kept my money and computer
customer_reviews.text: Amazon overcharged me for this computer, so I canceled it and bought another of the same at correct price. 2 weeks later I got the canceled one and sent it back unopened and they have kept over $4,000 of my money because they messed up the serial numbers. They re wives my return but never told me and kept my money for both and admitted this to me! Nothing is worth this stress of being stolen from like this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Apple Laptop But...
customer_reviews.text: If you're in the market for a new Apple laptop that has top performance go for the i9 with 8-cores. This 6-core is good but not great. I had the older version before this one and honestly the improvements are minuscule. Definitely not worth the extra hundreds of dollars. I video edit a lot and that's where the minimum improvements show up the most with the 6-core i7. I'm a little disappointed with how much I paid versus the 'improvements' has made. Get the i9 8-core if you can afford it.
customer_reviews.author: richard a. evans

customer_reviews.title: Superior build quality, superior performance, superior sound. Simply superior.
customer_reviews.text: Apple did a great job with this machine. The quality and performance are amazing. I'd purchased a high-spec Windows-based machine to give Win10 a try but the streaming ads in my workspace and the overall clutter simply were not worth the marginally 'lower' price. This new Macbook Pro delivers value and performance, which in turn gives me the power to do the same with my work.
customer_reviews.author: The bookish health nut

customer_reviews.title: Great for Video Editing in Adobe Premier Pro.
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of video editing. I had been using an i7 Windows Desktop gaming PC/48Gig RAM. I was getting fed up with constant Windows Updates and things that stopped working in the middle of editing because something was updating in the background. It always seems to required a restart before Premier would work again. I have only had this MAC a short time but I am very impressed by its performance. Videos are rendering fast and the 16GIG of ram has not been an issue at all. Its a bit pricey for the specs but the OS seems so much better at handling the processing than my Windows PC did.
customer_reviews.author: azpc35

customer_reviews.title: unknown noise from the system
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure where the noise was from when large data access is carried out by the computer. Sounds like old HDD noise, but the system runs on SSD. Frustrated!
customer_reviews.author: Ke Chen

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I personally liked the previous generation keyboard, although the durability issues were concerning. They seemed to have fixed the problem, but who knows. I figured it would take some getting used to the new keyboard, but it was instantly amazing. Really good keyboard. The rest of the computer is no slouch either, but if you’re not looking for a Mac already, nothing I say will change your mind.
customer_reviews.author: fitzage

customer_reviews.title: Replacement for my desktop Mac
customer_reviews.text: What a machine ! I have been a Mac convert for 1o+ years. This MacBook Pro 16 is incredible. I have purchased it to replace my aging 27 inch Mac. No regrets, the screen resolution is exceptional, the speed is blazing and with a 1TB drive, storage is not an issue. I am retired, do a lot of out door photography and this is my go to editing machine. I would buy again and recommend to family without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: Ron H Fovargue

customer_reviews.title: DOA. Super disappointed in this whole experience
customer_reviews.text: Not only did this machine not work when I went to set it up, but Amazon really gave me the runaround, insisting that we call Apple Support to get THEM to fix a "refurb" machine that arrived barely functioning. 3 hours later the result was the same: return it to Amazon and find a new computer to buy. NEVER AGAIN will I buy anything refurbished by Amazon. Apple should be PISSED.
customer_reviews.author: MWModern

customer_reviews.title: The item arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived damaged, screen was shatterred and won’t turn on!
customer_reviews.author: Levan Arabuli

customer_reviews.title: 100% not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: For the outrageous price you have to pay for this, it is not at all worth the money. The I9 cannot work as fast as it should with limited cooling in this laptop. The screen is ok but battery life is horrible and the computer is way too slow for what it should be. Save yourself the time and money and just build your own for much less money and make it more reliable. Oh and mine came damaged in the mail, bunch of scratches on the cover. Don’t buy a computer from amazon, second hand BS.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not believe you are getting a new state of the art computer.
customer_reviews.text: Setup has not been the easiest. No screen available from the old laptop. I believed I was getting a new state of the art Macbook Pro but actually received a 2019 version and probably all the problems associated with that model. Its like buying a 2020 automobile and finding out it is actually a 2019. Not exactly an honest approach from my particular point of view. I paid for 2020 but got something less than that...
customer_reviews.author: Dusty

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in 56 days, Amazon would not support
customer_reviews.text: The screen no longer worked within 60 days. Amazon only allows a return within 30 days. Amazon did not provide any technical support - even though it says specifically on the product listing that Amazon technical support is provided for up to 60 days. This was not true. The only option was to return and pay a fee or deal directly with Apple. My advice is to never purchase an Apple product through Amazon and deal with Apple directly.
customer_reviews.author: K.W.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong refund
customer_reviews.text: You are refunding the MacBook Air not the MacBook Pro. Computer was not what was described.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Machine
customer_reviews.text: Needless to say it's another brilliantly designed machine from Apple. Things that stood out for me particularly in this model: 1. Its body dimensions are almost the same as of previous 15" model. With thinner bezels, its able to pack a 16" screen. 2. Sound from the in-built speakers is a major step up from the previous generation. It is incredible how it cancels out vibrations from the woofers, giving you rich deep output, but surprisingly no vibrations in the laptop body. 3. Awesome new (actually old) MacBook keyboard :-)
customer_reviews.author: Khush

customer_reviews.title: Good option
customer_reviews.text: New and running like a champ. Battery life is ok when not using integrated AMD graphics but once you do 5 hrs is exactly what you can expect/ 8-10 on intel graphics. Still fantastic setup, would be great if Apple allows for under-clocking to fix the issue with system getting too hot under loads.
customer_reviews.author: Yohanly Martin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent machine - but screen door fragile and thin
customer_reviews.text: Be careful with the screen. It's not sufficiently supported by a sturdy metal frame as with previous MacBooks. It WILL break! Was skeptical about the touch bar but it is a great feature to have! Had to spend another $120 on a set of various adapters since this model ONLY offers Firebolt 3 ports. Battery life great. SSD speeds awesome. USB data transfer rate seems doubled on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Mac book pro return
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Do not purchase electronics from Amazon. Ordered a MacPro, it wasn’t what I expected. Returned it and have tried twice to get my refund (Amazon got the Mac back a week ago)! Customer Service promised refund by yesterday (7/23/20) and that this would be “prioritized”. Still no refund. That’s a TON OF MONEY! so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: linda b mead

customer_reviews.title: I believe in paying for quality. In this case, it was worth it and earned.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was accepted to Tulane. As a graduation/Christmas gift I gave him this laptop. His wonderful bright appreciative smile was all I could ever want.
customer_reviews.author: Annetteart

customer_reviews.title: Best apple laptop so far
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th mac laptop. As all the reviews say, they got this one right! Even the base model has enough memory and storage for my music files and videos the keyboard is smoother than older models and the sound output is nice enough you don’t automatically reach for bluetooth. Definitely appreciate the screen size as its mostly on the desk This was an amazon warehouse Purchase but I had no problems
customer_reviews.author: Creamburmese

customer_reviews.title: Great Experience After All!
customer_reviews.text: Hello Folks, B like U here! After 7 days I finally received my MacBook Pro 16'' Entry Level. Although it was a bit disappointing to find out that no air cushions were used during transportation, I was relieved to receive the product in perfect conditions. Bought it with the Amazon Prime Credit Card and got a great deal compared to those being sold at apple stores. If you want to save some money and delivery time is not an issue then, this is the place to buy it. Looking forward to trying out all my music softwares and testing how powerful this is.
customer_reviews.author: Dariel Rodríguez Arias

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Laptop!
customer_reviews.text: What a phenomenal product. I would buy this laptop over again in a heartbeat. I have to say that it is well worth the money and if I had known how happy I would have been with it I probably would have added more SSD space. What I have works well but I could have cut out the need for some external hdd if I had upgraded a bit. I would recommend this to anyone in the market and considering a MacBook.
customer_reviews.author: vinnie

customer_reviews.title: The speakers sound like high quality Bluetooth and the speed and graphics are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this MacBook, I use it for photo and video editing and it works perfect for both. The sound is amazing on it, I honestly don’t need any kind of headphones or studio speakers to hear the quality of sounds in my video.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey W.

customer_reviews.title: Too Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It is familiar since I am a MacBook Pro user yet it is awesome in the speed and graphics. Only complaint, if Apple is listening, is the location of the keyboard make my watch bracelet catches the surface. First World issue, yeah I know. 16 Inch is just too forking awesome.
customer_reviews.author: JT the weekend DIYer

customer_reviews.title: Big Mac is a Big success....
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this new Mac! Amazing display, sound, size, and speed....what more could you ask for. I already own a MacBook Pro, and feel that Apple really did a great job on this one. So far, no complaints. I still can’t believe how large the display really is!! Honestly, the price was hard to digest. After seeing it, I wasn’t disappointed
customer_reviews.author: 1900AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged
customer_reviews.text: This came damaged on the left side of the lid and on the hinge on the bottom of the laptop. I was very careful when opening the packaging and laptop. I don’t believe this is new, I think it’s refurbished.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Warning!!! Do not buy this $2K laptop from Amazon. I had just received it and it doesn’t even work. Blank screen with a folder picture blinking. Waste of money and time. They don’t even offer insurance AppleCare. Returning this immediately
customer_reviews.author: ami

customer_reviews.title: I was unfortunate and received a unit with problems
customer_reviews.text: Before starting doing any programming or data processing, I was using the machine first couple of days only for browsing and checking email and the battery would last 2-3 hours. People told me to switch to Safari for browsing but noway. After a session with Apple specialist, he recommended taking it to the Apple store to be examined.
customer_reviews.author: M.H.

customer_reviews.title: Best Macboook Pro to date!
customer_reviews.text: Best Macboook Pro to date! I bought the entry version 6-core / 16gb RAM / 512Gb and it’s been great and solid so far in almost everything. Great screen, great keyboard, superb sound and mics (for a laptop) great battery life and of course very good performance. The only issue is the webcam... honestly they must be using a 720p wecamera from a decade ago. Very poor quality, almost unusable in low light conditions. Shame on you apple for saving on the camera for a 2.5k+ laptop. I would say that every selfie’s cam above iPhone 5 is way better!!! For that reason I would give 4.5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir Mihalkov

customer_reviews.title: Transferred by Time Machine seamlessly!
customer_reviews.text: I finally had to break down and replace my mid 2012 Power Mac since I could no longer update the OS. I was very concerned because I had set my MAC up exactly as I wanted it and didn’t want to have to redo all my settings and reinstall apps, etc. I couldn’t be happier! The time machine backup I had done on my old Mac worked absolutely seamlessly in just a couple of hours! And the new Mac runs sooooo much quicker that I’m thrilled. I’ve got it plugged into a 27” Viewsonic monitor and it looks awesome! So glad I upgraded!
customer_reviews.author: Scoots Mason

customer_reviews.title: It's a very good laptop but
customer_reviews.text: Great sounds, magical keyboard, beautiful display but it does get unnecessary hot and drains the battery fast, run a couple of video editing software for 30 minutes and you will not need to microwave your pizza.
customer_reviews.author: Tung Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: defective MAC
customer_reviews.text: I get defective MAC. it keeps rebooting. I need to return this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dhara Patel

customer_reviews.title: Apple finally got things done.
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking at this machine for a while and finally caught a great deal. At $1999, the overall package is great for my need (Python programming, dozens of Chrome tabs, MS suites). I won't repeat all the good things that people have been talking about on YouTube or Amazon - the keyboard, speaker, screen, etc. The flaws like shadowing and heat issues when connected to external monitors have not been a problem for me. Hope this thing can hold up for at least 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: SHA YU

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Be careful when you purchase this product.Word or office products do not come with this product at this price and add 249.00 to the purchase price
customer_reviews.author: Patricia G. Romo

customer_reviews.title: Going from window 10 to Apple macbook format is a easy transition.
customer_reviews.text: Quality is very good. This is my first Apple laptop. I spend a day playing with it. I learned a lot of Apple protocol. I am not disappointed in buying this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: dscaballero

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy here
customer_reviews.text: Sent a broken seal mac and seems to be buggy!
customer_reviews.author: Raouf

customer_reviews.title: It’s all about luck
customer_reviews.text: Laptop lags and stuck at login page all the time, battery drains 10 percent in 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hsu

customer_reviews.title: Excellent laptop!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this laptop for a little over two weeks now and I love it. This is my first MacBook and I intend on using it for school. It seems to perform much better than my previous MSI laptop. The display is absolutely amazing. The battery life and speed at which this laptop carries out task has been very impressive. I cannot wait to see how this computer will aid me in my Computer science degree.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Smiff

customer_reviews.title: Facinating Macbook pro 16 inch
customer_reviews.text: This machine is an absolute beast, only problem I face is the heat through the aluminium body is irritating sometimes, way better than some windows laptop in the case of fan noise and trackpad, keyboard is the best part of it. After a month of usage I notice it has horrible battery life. As per their advertisement it is supposed to be atleast 10 hrs of battery life, but in relaity it dies after 4 hrs of usage.
customer_reviews.author: sudhershan

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but good...
customer_reviews.text: Good computer. Good specs but you’re definitely paying for the name. I love it and the fact that I finally have a pro but the price is way higher than it should be. I purchased it for podcasts and photo editing and it’s working good so far so no complaints other than the money
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!  Great Cost Savings Of Over $300!
customer_reviews.text: This is a legit MacBook Pro 16" model from Apple. I was a little skeptical, and called Apple to check the serial number as soon as I got it. It's legit 100% and you save anywhere from $250-$400 depending on options at the time of order. Can't go wrong!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherm

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great service.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great service. After a month of light use the camera stopped working. Luckily I had Apple Care. I took it Apple store and they got it replaced ( the entire screen/ top lid) and sent it back by FedEx express in 3 days. No issues since then.
customer_reviews.author: Parthasarathy Srinivasan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing laptop!
customer_reviews.text: If like me, you’ve been using Windows for years, the transition to Mac OS will take some getting used to but once you do, you’re in for a fantastic experience. The hardware itself is blazingly fast and a joy to use!
customer_reviews.author: J. S. Khera

customer_reviews.title: Overall okay product
customer_reviews.text: Well made computer Best specs No much innovation from the 15 MacBook Pro that I Have. Honestly you can save a lot of money buying 15 version instead of 16
customer_reviews.author: Li Hs

customer_reviews.title: Not New or like new
customer_reviews.text: This is not new or like new product. This is missing manual when i got it. It’s body and charger have some black marks. This is used product.
customer_reviews.author: Yuhnos

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: So much better than those cheap Windows computers. Sturdy and well-built. The software looks great and the screen is rich and vivid. The computer performs very well and definately meets (exceeds) my expectations. It can run Creative Cloud programs without any hangup and it interfaces with my new iPad Pro to provide a second screen. It can even connect to the iPad to utilize its cellular data connection--without any hassle or PW on my part.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price, high performance
customer_reviews.text: Best laptop I've used so far. Extremely fast, high processing power. I installed many heavy software like Adobe photoshop, PyCharm and IDEA Intellij and used all of them simultaneously and there was no performance drop at all. It's i9 processor and 16 GB RAM are able to handle very high work loads without any lag. The battery when fully charged lasts for at least 8 to 10 hours while using high processing software. The track pad gestures make it very easy and fun to use. It is definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Richa Nagda

customer_reviews.title: Not at all worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a MAJOR disappointment! It lags as I’m just moving the cursor across the screen! It has ZERO USB ports, which means you have to carry an adaa as peter around with you to get anything done. The battery life is sub-par. I’m lucky to get 4 hours out of it! I’ve spent the past 2 months Researching how to even use this laptop to save date, pics, and media... not user-friendly! There is NO WAY this thing is worth the price tag! I’ve had a $600 Asus laptop that functioned better than this -.-
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it best laptop out
customer_reviews.text: Love it and I actually saved almost $200 from apples price (I was lucky caught a quick deal) as new machines rarely go on sale. What can I say I still use a 2009 17 inch MacBook Pro they last forever as long as you get the upgraded ones I think my 2009 work better than my friends new HP I would always tell people to get the upgraded one if you can as it buys you more time in the future. You can get 10 years easy out of a upgraded MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Best Apple Laptop
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best Apple Laptop I have owned I have had other's in the past which were good and gave me no problems, but the overall build quality, screen size ,and ease of use have been the best , the new keyboard they are using now has a bit more travel and is a joy to type on. I would Highly Recommend this Laptop with no reservations
customer_reviews.author: Richard wagner

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY.
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about it. I also bought accessories for it from Amazon as well. It was nothing different about it. The same experience I would have had if I ordered it from Apple. But, the product is still under Apple Amazon. I just wanted it ASAP! & due to COVID-19 stuff takes way too long to ship so I got it from Amazon bc with my Prime account I got it the very next day. Prime is just the best thing anyways. Bc if you like me.. I want all my packages ASAP! I’m impatient. But, yeah great experience, great purchase. This isn’t my first Apple product ordered through Amazon either. I got my AirPods from Amazon too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the budget. As graphic designer I would describe as a great startup computer. Fast and reliable. Overheats a little bit though. Doesn’t like to transfer programs from my older computer do I kind had to work my way around in order to get it done without loosing my data. So make sure you have a backup copy of all your files in case you need to restore it to default upon installation and setups.
customer_reviews.author: Val Smith

customer_reviews.title: I put in for a return on this Mac, I didn't like the wait time and it was not ever delivered to me.
customer_reviews.text: I had to order another Mac from Apple and that went bad to, So I tried Apple again and got my mac two weeks later.
customer_reviews.author: Denny Carlton

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t charge! Called Apple, they want me to buy a new charger for 98 when I can get it on Amazon for 39! Even though the 2100 laptop is still under warrantee. NOT GOOD!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Performance and Magic Keyboard are stupendous!
customer_reviews.text: I like the thin bezels around the screen which resulted in a much fuller view screen for work and multitasking. Although the new display looks great--the keyboard is a significant added change since it includes Apple's new magic keyboard. It is probably the best Mac keyboard ever released by the folks at Apple. Overall, this new MacBook is rather pricey, but there's a reason it is called "Pro" because it is designed for professional. With this laptop you're paying for performance in a portable package.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC !
customer_reviews.text: So happy with my NEW MacBook Pro! I have always used Mac but this is my first NEW purchase. LOVE LOVE LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah M Walker

customer_reviews.title: All in all, this is a computer worth buying
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard changed back to scissors say feel much better The biggest trackpad I've ever seen looks wider than a keyboard, and it works, and it works. I've never used a MacBook trackpad before, and it's easy to use. As for the screen, this 16' large screen has a resolution of 3072*1920, which is super delicate. After watching this screen, other laptop screens should not enter the eye, and I don't know whether it is a good thing or a bad thing.
customer_reviews.author: Maojun Li

customer_reviews.title: No Buyers Remorse
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It’s a big improvement in speed over my 2011 MacBook Pro. I like to write, this makes it easier to do so. Also the sound quality of the speakers is amazing to listen to music with while writing. I can also enjoy editing photos more. All in all a solid machine. Glad I bought it. I don’t know if it’s for you, but I’d recommend it to anyone who likes to buy quality. I have no buyers remorse at all from this one.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Computer
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It’s everything you’d expect from Apple. It did take about a week from order to arrive but it looks great and so far works great. We had our old one for 10 years and needed an upgrade- we hope this one lasts another 10.
customer_reviews.author: hannah

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't disappoint.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't plan on buying this, but when Apple decided to announce their new Silicon plans - I had to grab an intel based macbook (I bootcamp - I mainly use Mac OS for iOS development and spend 80% of my time in windows). CPU is super fast, screen is great, keyboard is awesome - the only thing I wonder is how well the touch bar will hold up... but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Web Geek

customer_reviews.title: Great Computer
customer_reviews.text: I held on to my previous MacBook Pro 13 inch for 7 years, and it served me very well, and I gave it away to a needy family who needed a computer for their children. Made this purchase and I couldn’t be happier. Very easy to setup, I love the Touch ID, bright and crisp display, and it’s fast speed. You really can’t go wrong with the MacBook Pro for all your computer needs.
customer_reviews.author: BrandonL

customer_reviews.title: notebook is overheating
customer_reviews.text: Worst notebook I've ever had, I can't do anything, is overheating all the time. The actual price should be 200$ not 2000. I don't know what to do with this trash now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s an apple so..
customer_reviews.text: Always a good choice! Glad it was on sale because I don’t like paying full price for Apple products haha came wrapped in original plastic and shipped with care in protective box. Works properly and fully functional.
customer_reviews.author: Sven

customer_reviews.title: Integration with my various devices!
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for my 2012 MacBook laptop that still worked. I felt I needed a replacement. Love the ability to work between my Tablet, iPhone, and my laptop. A very polished machine.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Computer broke and it hasn't even been 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: It shutdown twice unexpectedly and the two USB-C ports on the right don't charge with the adapter or work with the dongle. On Apple chat now and on my way to the Genius bar. Think twice because this one has problems.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Really nice, fast and gorgeous screen
customer_reviews.text: I like the big gorgeous screen, how fast it is and the 16 Gb of memory is plenty to run many applications simultaneously. I didn't think it was going to be a big deal but I found the TouchId to be really nice - I like the way it lets me unlock the screen without having to type in my password.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Chate

customer_reviews.title: Delivered
customer_reviews.text: The box was open when deliver I haven't had a chance to take it to geek squad have appointment on 04/28/20. Will see if not damage
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work right out of the box...
customer_reviews.text: Buy from Apple. Froze when trying to transfer data, now is in kernel panic.
customer_reviews.author: GinMadison

customer_reviews.title: The best 💯
customer_reviews.text: I love my MacBook Pro. It’s everything I thought it would be and more. The speakers sound better than my dang TV!!! The picture quality and brightness are fantastic. The trackpad is superb and the keyboard JUST WORKS! So glad they ditched the butterfly keyboard. I wasn’t able to purchase the apple care for this product through amazon and for some reason I couldn’t get it online either even though it stated it qualified for it, but Apple customer care helped me right away and fixed the problem. Couldn’t be happier. 🤩
customer_reviews.author: OcarinaOfBork

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop no USB ports
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned MacBook Pro’s in the past and I’m always extremely satisfied with them. Enjoy the touchpad and the keyboard. The display is beautiful. Only drawback is there are no USB ports. I had to buy an adapter to be able use USB drives. Only drawback so far.
customer_reviews.author: Njaridr1

customer_reviews.title: Great Computer overall!
customer_reviews.text: Computer works great, has really wonderful graphics, lots of memory, and a nice keyboard. On the downside, it's pretty heavy and the bottom gets really hot.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: It. Just. Works.
customer_reviews.text: I bought an XPS 13 before this and hated every minute of it and returned it within a week. Using this 16 inch MBP has been a magical experience! It seems pricy but a device this good will last for years! I love every minute of it. Works like a beast no matter what you throw at it. The keyboard feels so good I wanted to cry first time I typed on it. If you got the dough, look no further. Cons: I’m used to 13 inch so this felt HUGE and very heavy, barely fits in my backpack. Also, it’s not meant for gaming so, don’t even try.
customer_reviews.author: Adiraj Chauhan

customer_reviews.title: The best gift
customer_reviews.text: My wife's MacBooks were older and she was debating replacing one with the smaller, older MBP that this one replaced. There are several ways to say Happy Birthday; this one worked pretty well...
customer_reviews.author: Stuart C Lathrop

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing buy! Steal of a deal. I showed the post to an Apple store rep and they couldn't believe the price! They confirmed that it was identical to the one I was just about to buy in store and even recommended this one! Don't hesitate!
customer_reviews.author: Stephie

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Such an amazing laptop I’ve been dreaming about , the battery is ok while I’m not using a program that consume the processor such as Final Cut, the sound is beautiful the bass is so great , I love it I’m including a pic comparing next to my old 13” MacBook Air
customer_reviews.author: De

customer_reviews.title: Apple MacBook Lives Up To It’s Reputation!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: it’s everything my college kid required and wanted. Screen resolution good. Set up easy. Works well. Good battery power. Well worth the money. Bought the extended warranty. It’s an investment for sure. Cons: pricey after adding warranty and taxes.
customer_reviews.author: imirishgal

product_meta.title: New Apple MacBook Pro (16-inch, 16GB RAM, 1TB Storage, 2.3GHz Intel Core i9) - Space Gray
feature_bullets: Stunning 16-inch Retina Display with True Tone technology
AMD Radeon Pro 5500M Graphics with GDDR6 memory
Up to 11 hours of battery life
